title: Kled's voiceover

replies.body:
Kled can say he want to cut open a person and use their spine as a backscratcher, tear out their lungs and such and swear his ass off but poor Khada Jhin can't have his original, uncensored color text :(

////But this is so good, well done :'DDDD

Thanx!   Actually both Jhin and Kled ran into the same problem for me. Not swear words- but visual descriptions that were deemed too violent for a T-teen ESRB rating.   In both cases though,  gotta give props to our production people (Product Owners,  Production Managers, Editors, and Legal staff) . They spent a lot of time finding out what was the maximum level we could deliver.
Now I wanna know what Jhin's line was

For Jhin's recall.  We recorded a bucket of haikus.   Very disturbing haikus.     I'm gonna try and post them on youtube at some point.
   
His color text described one of his victims dying---  Ultimately I think the story worked better leaving her death to the players imagination though.

Because for some reason, Sion's lines or Thresh's Short story are acceptable.

Well i'll be looking forward to seeing that Jhin stuff then. :P
In that color text where it described one of his victims dying, did Jhin use his gun?

Yeah it showed how the gun worked in the original.
She dies in the "color text" but you only get reactions to her death.   

I showed her dying in the original "story sketch"-  i think, as a pure story,  the new version is better. --but seeing how she died and how Jhin behaved while killing her was more useful for the pod working on her.

All I can say is.... Kreygasm. Please do post it. (There were a few poems from him right? Posted at Surr@20?) 

As for his color text - I'm so _intrigued_ by this character, I really wanna know how he does his "thing". Something like does he create physical contact with his victims (like most serial killers, but most of them kill because of sexual reasons....?), OR just dances around them, from a distance  - "standing in the background, conducting the performance"? 

It would be a great help for getting the character right for artistic reasons (I'd like to draw a Jhin-Sona encounter, and I have to make sure the composition is perfect!). :D
He's hilarious, though I admit the high pitched screaming annoys me. But whoever wrote his dialogue deserves props.
I loved it too. Sadly, english voiceover is not available on russian server, and i suspect localization to be terrible. He is so charismatic...

Go to the game's folder and find a file named Locale.cfg.  Open it with the notepad, replace the ru_RU line with en_US and save. Congratulations! Your game is now in English even though your server does not support it.

That's how I got LOL to run in English even though I play on LAS :)
#I AM DEEP-FRIED COURAGE, AND AN APPLE PIE OF ANGRY!
"Oh S*** were lost" lost my shit on that one.
